title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements for the self-healing solar panel system.

title: Architectural Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including hardware and software components, communication protocols, self-healing mechanisms, data management, and integration with existing systems.

title: Hardware Development
description: Design and develop the hardware components for the self-healing solar panel system, including sensors, actuators, and control units.

title: Software Development
description: Develop the software components for the self-healing solar panel system, including the control algorithms, user interfaces, and communication protocols.

title: Integration and Testing
description: Integrate the hardware and software components, and perform comprehensive testing to ensure the self-healing capabilities and overall system functionality.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the system meets relevant security and compliance standards, including data privacy and cybersecurity measures.

title: Deployment and Maintenance
description: Plan and implement the deployment strategy for the self-healing solar panel system, including installation, monitoring, and maintenance procedures.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and training materials for users, installers, and maintenance personnel.
